attributes.action: Give the British Tax Payer a Vote to Cut Foreign Aid
attributes.background: To Much tax payers money is being used on foreign aid for ridicules schemes and to countries that don't need it when it is needed more in this country

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament.

If you would like there to be a referendum on foreign aid, you could sign the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/126486
